title: HTML attribute: Slot
post:
{{Sidebar("web/html/reference/global_attributes")}}

The **`slot`** [global attribute](/blog/Web/HTML/Reference/Global_attributes) assigns a slot in a [shadow DOM](/blog/Web/API/Web_components/Using_shadow_DOM) shadow tree to an element: An element with a `slot` attribute is assigned to the slot created by the {{HTMLElement("slot")}} element whose [`name`](/blog/Web/HTML/Reference/Elements/slot#name) attribute's value matches that `slot` attribute's value. You can have multiple elements assigned to the same slot by using the same slot name. Elements without a `slot` attribute are assigned to the unnamed slot, if one exists.

For examples, see our [Using templates and slots](/blog/Web/API/Web_components/Using_templates_and_slots) guide.
